Section.Catchline: Ratification of certain municipal parking surcharges.

SectionBody.Text: Any ordinance of any municipality imposing a surcharge pursuant to s. 132, chapter 99-251, Laws of Florida, is hereby ratified. All acts and proceedings, including enforcement procedures, taken in connection with a parking surcharge imposed by a municipality pursuant to s. 132, chapter 99-251, are ratified, validated, and confirmed, and the surcharge is declared to be legal and valid in all respects from the date of enactment of chapter 99-251.
